## PARTICIPANTS

Workshop participants are listed in \autoref{tabParticipants}.

\begin{table}
\centering
\caption[Workshop participants]{Participants in the {TESA} workshop on tools for transparent, traceable, and transferable assessments.
Legend: chair, C; and instructor, I.}
```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Import participant table
participants <- read_csv( file="../tables/Participants.csv", col_names=TRUE,
  col_types=cols(), na=" " ) %>%
  # arrange( Region, Name ) %>%  # -- why can't this be included?
  # Prepare the table for latex
  kable( booktabs=TRUE, linesep="", format="latex", escape=FALSE,
    align=c("l", "l", "c", "c", "c", "c") ) %>%
  # kable_styling( latex_options=c("striped") ) %>%
  row_spec( 0, bold=TRUE ) %>%
  add_header_above( c(" ", " ", "Day"=4), bold=TRUE ) %>%
  print( )
```
\label{tabParticipants}
\end{table}
